2352|11:52 P.M.|And then the VCR broke.
I heard the wheels spin
column4: then stop. I hit “eject” and nothing happened. I poked at all the buttons. I unplugged and replugged the machine. I picked it up and shook it. I banged on it with the butt of my hand
column5: then a shoe. Nothing was working. Outside
column6: it was dark. My phone said it was January 6

column1: 2352|eight minutes to midnight|It was eight minutes to midnight. Just nice time
column3: everything was quiet and in darkness. Splendid. I went to the bar and fetched a tumbler
column4: a siphon of soda and a bottle of Glen Grant
column5: took a weak drink and a pill
column6: and settled down in the public dining-room to wait the remaining two minutes.
